description: three portraits; lower left Marco Ricci; bust length turned left, looking at viewer; lower right Sr. Ralph Cole / Bar't on paper to his right along with artist's palette, brushes and open book; turned left and looking at viewer; above left a drape being pulled back by a putto; above right a half length picture of a man, labeled Tallman at top, facing right and studying a book
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

in black upper right: P.387 | below image in black: a. Bannerman sculp. / MARCO RICCI | inscribed in plate: Tallman / Sr. Ralph Cole / Bar\'t | on sheet in pencil: 2-296
title: Marco Ricci
